attributes.action: encourage companies to make it easier for the public to report phishing and spam
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I appreciate Microsoft, Yahoo et al are improving spam filters all the time, but there are too many phishing emails out there at the moment, claiming to be from banks. The current ones warn of having detected illegal activity on your account. The link address it shows looks genuine, but hovering over it reveals a completely different destination.
These need special action, not just hitting a "spam" button. But it is almost impossible to alert either the email provider, or maybe even more importantly the bank concerned. They claim to care, but it is far from this impression they give, and need more encouragement to do so.
